title: Serif font from Into Another credits
content:
I'm recreating an LP layout and need to know what font this is.  
Thank you for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/credits_3817.jpg)

Thank you donshottype!!!

Font: 

 Palatino Bold 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112136/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")
author: Tonga Tom

comments.content:
Looks like Palatino Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/palatino/bold/glyphs.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/palatino/bold/glyphs.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/palatino/bold/glyphs.html")  
Expanded horizontally.  
Don
